name: shareplan
0:
”Alexa, tell share plan that Alice will return before ten pm”
”Alexa, ask share plan what are the plans”
”Alexa, tell share plan I am home”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: share plan
des: Share plan he helps families or roommates share their planned activities and expected times to return home. A family member or roommate can access or update the shared information by using Alexa enabled devices or with the Alexa app on a mobile phone. Use "open share plan" to get started.
